about_the_game:
Bark and Catch is a dynamic game for 1-2 players where you play as dogs tasked with important jobs on the farm within a limited time: feeding the animals and escorting them to the barn. Protect them from predators and prevent crafty thieves from stealing anything from your farm.

Different dog breeds – different playstyles

Meet our furry heroes - the Corgi, German Shepherd, and Golden Retriever. Each dog has unique abilities.

Corgi

This is the main herder on the farm. His loud "Woof" cleverly herds the animals to the barn and feeders. He can grow food and ensure the little ones don’t go hungry.

German Shepherd

This is the agile protector. She can drive away predators and annoying thieves. The Shepherd can handle any situation, as she knows how to operate various stationary towers. No wolf can withstand her.

Golden Retriever

This is a smart and supportive dog; he knows how to work with mechanisms – opening doors, raising elevators, and even managing bridges. He can also partially substitute for the Corgi or Shepherd.

name: Bark and Catch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 (2 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Bark and Catch is a dynamic game for 1-2 players where you play as dogs tasked with important jobs on the farm within a limited time: feeding the animals and escorting them to the barn. Protect them from predators and prevent crafty thieves from stealing anything from your farm.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
